data.title: Population Statistics, Maps, Charts, Weather and Web Information
data.meta_description: Republic of South Sudan with population statistics, maps, charts, weather and web information.
data.text:
States

The population of the states of South Sudan according to census results and latest official projections.

Presidential decrees of 2015 and 2017 replace the ten states by 32 new states.
